command: sha256sum /root/firmware_orig.img /root/firmware_mod.img && mkdir -p /mnt/orig /mnt/mod && mount -o loop /root/firmware_orig.img /mnt/orig && mount -o loop /root/firmware_mod.img /mnt/mod && diff -qr /mnt/orig /mnt/mod || true; umount /mnt/mod; umount /mnt/orig
explanation: Compares original and modified firmware images by both checksums and file-level differences to validate injected changes.
rationale_steps: Hash both images to establish distinct identities.
Mount images and perform a recursive diff to enumerate modifications.
Clean up mounts to avoid leaving traces.
